==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|日|曜}}

===Etymology===
Originally it meant the sun<ref name="Amoghavajra" />. A [[calque]] of {{cog|la|dies Solis}} and its descendants. Compare {{m|ja|日|tr=hi|gloss=sun}}.

===Pronunciation===
* [[音読み|On'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ni.t͡ɕi.jo.o/|[nit͡ɕijo̞ː]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|にちよう|hhira=にちえう}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} the [[sun]]
# [[Sunday]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|日曜日|にちようび}}

===See also===
* {{ja-r|七曜|しちよう}}: a [[week]]
